author: mroguljic
body: [PR#47966](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47966) shows unexpected widely distributed small differences in test workflows. The minimal changes in this draft produce the same number of differences on a single workflow, 140.045, as the PR. This draft is created to allow the cms bot to run tests to check if the same happens in other workflows.
title: [DRAFT] minimum changes to produce wf diffs seen in PR#47966
